oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Textual loss at top of leaves due to worm damage.
Copy completed in Muḥarram 1157 [1743] in the hand of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad.
With this is: Manẓūmah fī al-ṭalāq / li-ʻAbd Allāh al-Hibṭī (ff. 10v-12v).
MS Arab 383. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
